revised_title: General Methods for Solving Linear Equations in Finite Differences and Linear Differential Equations
tldr: The author presents a method for solving linear equations in finite differences and linear differential equations. The approach involves transforming the equations into a series of equations of the first order and applying a process of successive elimination. The method provides a solution in the form of a series of equations, which can be used to find the values of the variables involved in the original equation.
